meanings.def: an official examination of business and financial records to see that they are true and correct
an official examination of the quality or standard of something
to officially examine the financial accounts of a company
examples: We have just had our accounts audited.
The National Audit office is responsible for auditing the accounts of a wide range of bodies.

meanings.def: to attend a course at college or university but without taking any exams or receiving credit
examples: She audited classes at the University of California.
